verses.name: Proverbs 15:23
verses.text: A man hath joy by the answer of his mouth: and a word spoken in due season, how good is it!

verses.name: Proverbs 15:24
verses.text: The way of life is above to the wise, that he may depart from hell beneath.

verses.name: Proverbs 15:25
verses.text: The Lord will destroy the house of the proud: but he will establish the border of the widow.

verses.name: Proverbs 15:26
verses.text: The thoughts of the wicked are an abomination to the Lord: but the words of the pure are pleasant words.

verses.name: Proverbs 15:27
verses.text: He that is greedy of gain troubleth his own house; but he that hateth gifts shall live.
